trans-unit.source: Instances of this class are passed to a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler> method that is called when a <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> call completes.
trans-unit.target: 此类的实例传递给<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler>时调用的方法<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>调用完成。</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> methods send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request asynchronously and wait for a corresponding ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>方法以异步方式发送 Internet 控制消息协议 (ICMP) 回显请求并等待相应的 ICMP 回显回复消息。</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A> property contains the results of the ICMP echo request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A>属性包含的 ICMP 回送请求结果。</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that contains data that describes an attempt to send an Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP) echo request message and receive a corresponding ICMP echo reply message.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含描述发送 Internet 控制消息协议 (ICMP) 回显请求消息和接收相应 ICMP 回显回复消息的尝试的数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the value of <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> is not <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>, you should not use the values that are returned by the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>, <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>不<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus>，不应使用返回的值<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>， <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>，和<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>属性。</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> and <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> properties will return zero, and the <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> property will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>和<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>属性将返回零，和<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>属性将返回`null`。</xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> </xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply"></xref> object that describes the results of the ICMP echo request.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply"> </xref>对象，描述 ICMP 回送请求结果。
